text: The Batcave is the fictional secret lair of the DC Comics superhero Batman. It is on the foundation of Wayne Manor. There are two ways into the cave, one is through a waterfall on the back of the cave and the other is a built-in elevator that leads from the library of Wayne Manor to the bridge of the cave. It holds all of Batman's secrets, gadgets, the Batmobile, and a real gorge. The cave also has millions of bats. == In other media == The Batcave has appeared in different forms of media, including movies, television series, and video games. ==References== ==Other websites== * Top 10 Batcave Trophies Article on ComicsBulletin about the Batcave Hall of Trophies Category:Batman Category:Fictional locations
title: Batcave
